text: The Man Who Killed Don Quixote is a 2018 British Belgian French Spanish and Portuguese adventure fantasy comedy movie directed by Terry Gilliam and was based on the 1605/1615 novel Don Quixote by Miguel de Cervantes. It stars Adam Driver, Jonathan Pryce, Stellan Skarsgård, Olga Kurylenko, Joana Ribeiro, Jason Watkins, Óscar Jaenada and was distributed by Warner Bros.. ==Other websites== * Category:2018 adventure movies Category:2018 comedy movies Category:2018 fantasy movies Category:British adventure movies Category:British comedy movies Category:British fantasy movies Category:Belgian comedy movies Category:Belgian fantasy movies Category:French adventure movies Category:French comedy movies Category:French fantasy movies Category:Spanish adventure movies Category:Spanish comedy movies Category:Spanish fantasy movies Category:Portuguese movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Movies directed by Terry Gilliam Category:Movies set in Portugal
title: The Man Who Killed Don Quixote
